channel.title: Android Phone on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Android Phone on 0x000216

item.title: Samsung Intercept Android Phone Goes NASCAR
item.description: What’s both thrilling and fast-paced, almost too much to handle? NASCAR is a fitting example, but so is the Samsung Intercept Android phone. And surprisingly, they’re connected! The Samsung Intercept M910 for Sprint is a dual phone, offering both a large 3-inch touchscreen display and a slide-out QWERTY keyboard with spacious keys for efficient typing and texting. As an Android 2.1 phone, it offers access to thousands of customizable apps from the Android market.

item.title: Your Ally In The Android vs iPhone Battle
item.description: LG’s initial Android offering, the LG Ally for Verizon Wireless, is a remarkable device. It boasts a range of features and access to a vast library of apps on the Android Market. If you prioritize texting and email, you’ll appreciate the tactile feedback of real keys. The LG Ally features a 3.2-inch touchscreen and a slide-out QWERTY keyboard with well-sized keys. With five customizable home screens, you can personalize it with numerous Android apps.
